text: Dickie Owen (26 March 1927 - 7 April 2015) was a British actor. He was known for his roles in Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, Z-Cars, Zulu, The Curse of the Mummy's Tomb and The Mummy's Shroud. He acted between 1959 and 1968. He died at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors
title: Dickie Owen
